snippet.title: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood: The Story | Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
snippet.description:
Assassin’s Creed Origins is now available!
  
 Watch the Official Launch Trailer: http://ubi.li/8ytgx
  
 #AssassinsCreed
  
 Please SUBSCRIBE and visit our official channels for exclusive access and the latest information on all things Assassin’s Creed:
 #AssassinsCreed
 https://AssassinsCreed.com 
 https://www.facebook.com/assassinscreed
 https://instagram.com/AssassinsCreed_US
 https://twitter.com/assassinscreed
 https://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
  
Discover all our Assassin's Creed products and exclusive items on the Ubisoft Store: http://ubi.li/8fcmd
  
 Cesare Borgia tells his story: "Through the years, I have watched the city of Rome. I have studied, trained, and killed within its walls. And in time, I have tamed it, shaped it. Nowhere in this city have I met a man equal to myself..." 
  
 ABOUT ASSASSIN’S CREED BROTHERHOOD:
 Enjoy new adventures this completely new take on the franchise gameplay and artistic direction: collect powerful Assassins, manage you HQ, improve your heroes’ skills and make your path in epic missions. 
 
 Key Features:
 
 -Build Your Brotherhood
 Team up with more than 40 characters, including Ezio, Shao Jun, Aguilar and many other new heroes. 
 
 -Manage Your HQ
 Build new rooms, craft new equipment, gather resources or create new medicine. Train and upgrade your Assassins.
 
 -Infiltrate Templars Strongholds
 Choose the perfect team of Assassins to send on covert missions throughout Spain and achieve the objective. Fight your way through, or apply a more stealthy approach? Choose wisely.
  
  
 Assassin's Creed Brotherhood: The Story | Trailer | Ubisoft [NA]
 https://www.youtube.com/UbisoftNA
